item.title: CVE-2018-3777|2024-08-05T04:50:30.459Z -- https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2Frestforce -- restforce%20ruby%20gem
item.description: Insufficient URI encoding in restforce before 3.0.0 allows attacker to inject arbitrary parameters into Salesforce API requests.
